Shared.supportDesc: Need assistance? Our team is here to help you dominate the UGC space.
Shared.whatsappDesc: Connect with our local agents instantly for booking issues or inquiries.
Shared.faq1Q: How do I use my credits?
Shared.faq1A: Credits are automatically applied when you finalize a campaign or studio booking mission.
Shared.faq2A: Cancellations are free up to 24 hours before the scheduled mission start time.

Landing.heroDescription: Book top-tier Moroccan creators and premium studios in seconds. Use code {code} for 20% off your first campaign.
Landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Go Viral.
Landing.featuresSubtitle: Streamline your entire content production workflow from a single, powerful dashboard.
Landing.feature1Desc: Access a curated network of top-tier creators ready to produce authentic, high-converting content for your brand.
Landing.feature2Desc: Book fully equipped production spaces with green screens, podcast setups, and professional lighting in seconds.
Landing.feature3Desc: Get your content delivered in as little as 48 hours. Agile production for the fast-paced social media landscape.
Landing.feature4Desc: Keep track of your spending, completed orders, and active bookings â€” all from a single, clean dashboard.
Landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Three simple steps to your next winning campaign.
Landing.step1Desc: Ship your products to our studio in Casablanca or Rabat. We handle the logistics.
Landing.step2Desc: Our Moroccan creators produce authentic, viral-ready videos tailored to your brand.
Landing.step3Desc: Get 4K videos delivered to your dashboard or via WhatsApp in 48h. Approve and go viral.
Landing.statsSubtitle: From Casablanca to Marrakech â€” we help brands create scroll-stopping content, fast.
Landing.ctaNoCommitment: No commitment. Book your first session today.
Landing.footerBrandDesc: The #1 UGC Platform in Morocco. We connect brands with top local creators and premium studios to produce viral content that converts.
Landing.footerAddress:

Auth.createAccountSubtitle: Enter your details to access the dashboard.

Auth.forgotSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
Auth.checkEmailDesc: If an account exists with that email, we've sent a password reset link. Check your inbox and spam folder.
Auth.notRobotConfirm: Please confirm you are not a robot
Auth.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Auth.confirmationSent: We've sent a confirmation link to your email address. Click it to activate your account.
Auth.checkSpam: Check your spam folder or try signing up again with the same email.
